conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, and C.
Predict which container (D or E) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
There are three openings labeled A, B, and C at the top of the image.
There are baffles of different colors and orientations in the image.
There are two containers labeled D and E at the bottom of the image.
Liquid from A will be directed by the purple baffle towards container D.
Liquid from B will be directed by the yellow baffle towards container D.
Liquid from C will be directed by the blue baffle towards container D.
All liquid flows from A, B, and C will end up in container D.
Final answer: Liquid will flow into container D.
